info.title: Schedule API V3 Public for Club

get.summary: Endpoint to get bookings (participants and guests) for events within a date range

204.description: No content - no events or bookings found

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The club ID

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: Start date in UTC milliseconds

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: End date in UTC milliseconds (must be >= date_start)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page (max 100)

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: Filter by participant member_id (mutually exclusive with other filters)

parameters.name: original_member_id
parameters.description: Filter by participant original_member_id (mutually exclusive with other filters)

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: Filter by guest external_id (mutually exclusive with other filters)

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by guest email (mutually exclusive with other filters)

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Filter by soft-deleted status of participants/guests

get.summary: Endpoint to search events based on given date range with pagination. Returns only group classes and appointments.

200.description: Return list of events (appointments and group classes only) with pagination

message.example: Invalid date_start format. Expected integer timestamp in milliseconds.
There was an error with the data sources. An availability could not be found.

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: The club identifier

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: Start date timestamp in UTC milliseconds (inclusive)

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: End date timestamp in UTC milliseconds (inclusive)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of events per page

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Whether to include deleted events (default: false)

message.example: Either member_id/original_member_id or guest must be provided

original_member_id.description: Original Member ID (mutually exclusive with member_id)

external_id.description: Guest external ID (mutually exclusive with email)

delete.summary: Endpoint to delete (cancel) a booking for an event

message.example: One of (member_id, original_member_id, external_id, guest_email) must be provided

404.description: Not found - event or booking not found

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: Member identifier (for standard clubs)

parameters.name: original_member_id
parameters.description: Member identifier (for superclubs)

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: External identifier (for guests)

parameters.name: guest_email
parameters.description: Guest email (for guest bookings)

parameters.name: refund
parameters.description:
Determines whether a refund should be issued (leading rule).
Default: true
- refund=true: Always refund credits, regardless of free_cancellation_range
- refund=false, free_cancellation_range=true: Refund depends on free cancellation range (check if within free cancellation period)
- refund=false, free_cancellation_range=false: No refund

parameters.name: free_cancellation_range
parameters.description:
Applies free cancellation window rule. Default: true
- free_cancellation_range=true: Apply free cancellation period check (refund depends on timing if refund=false)
- free_cancellation_range=false: Skip free cancellation period check (exception case)

parameters.name: cancellation_range
parameters.description:
Applies regular cancellation window rule. Default: true
- cancellation_range=true: Apply cancellation range validation (check if cancellation is allowed and within time window)
- cancellation_range=false: Skip cancellation range validation (exception case, allow cancellation even outside window)

post.summary: Endpoint to create a booking for an event (member or guest)

200.description: Booking response (success or failure with reason)

booking_blocked_until.description: Timestamp when booking block expires (only present if member is blocked)

message.example: An error occurred while creating the booking

member_id.description: Member ID (provide either member_id/original_member_id OR guest, not both)

original_member_id.description: Original Member ID (provide either member_id/original_member_id OR guest, not both)

guest.description: Guest information (provide either member_id/original_member_id OR guest, not both)

presence.description: Whether to mark the participant as present

apply_booking_rules.description: Optional rules to apply during booking. Each rule can be true (apply rule), false (skip rule), or null (defaults to true - rule is applied). If the entire apply_booking_rules object is omitted, all rules are applied (default to true).

bookable_till_range.description: Check if event is still open for booking (skipped if not provided)

booking_closes_range.description: Verify booking is before closure cutoff (skipped if not provided)

min_time_between_bookings_range.description: Enforce time gap between bookings - members only (skipped if not provided)

penalty_booking.description: Check for existing penalty restrictions - members only (skipped if not provided)
